name: devconsole
description: Script dev console for launching development funtionality via a commandline.

scripts.rollup: del .\dc.js && rollup src/index.js --file dc.js --format esm --name devconsole
scripts.rollumd: del  .\dc.umd.js && rollup src/index.js --file dc.umd.js --format umd --name devconsole

author: FiveEses
